snippet: Drawing a vivid contrast with Democrats and the Obama administration, Paul Ryan, the new speaker of the House, vowed to pursue legislation that will frame a stark choice for voters next year.
abstract: House Speaker Paul D Ryan delivers speech at Library of Congress in which he vows to pursue legislation aimed at making government conform to his conservative vision, which will offer stark contrast to Democratic policies in run up to 2016 election; speech signals that Ryan is stepping decisively into role of leader of Republican Party.
lead_paragraph: Drawing a vivid contrast with Democrats and the Obama administration, Paul Ryan, the new speaker of the House, vowed to pursue legislation that will frame a stark choice for voters next year.

headline.main: Ryan Throws Down Republican Gauntlet in Outlining House Agenda for ’16
headline.print_headline: Ryan Throws Down Republican Gauntlet in Outlining House Agenda for ’16
